system.admin: Can operate all resources, users, tenants

tenant.admin: Can operate all resources under the tenant
tenant.normal: You can only see the projects you are involved in

project.admin: Can operate all resources under the project
project.dev: An environment where only R&D properties can be manipulated
project.test: An environment where only test properties can be manipulated

environment.reader: Can only view resources in the environment

mesh.admin: Can operate resources under the microservice virtual space
mesh.normal: View resources under the microservice virtual space
